articles.title: Russia's Gazprom tightens squeeze on gas flow to Europe - Reuters
articles.description: Russia tightened its gas squeeze on Europe on Monday as Gazprom (GAZP.MM) said supplies through the Nord Stream 1 pipeline to Germany would drop to just 20% of capacity.
articles.content:
MOSCOW, July 25 (Reuters) - Russia tightened its gas squeeze on Europe on Monday as Gazprom (GAZP.MM) said supplies through the Nord Stream 1 pipeline to Germany would drop to just 20% of capacity.
